lead_paragraph: General Motors said on Friday that the costs of closing a plant in Antwerp, Belgium, would run 400 million euros ($532 million).
snippet: General Motors said on Friday that the costs of closing a plant in Antwerp, Belgium, would run 400 million euros ($532 million).

headline.main: Belgium Plant Closing Costs G.M. Millions
headline.print_headline: Belgium Plant Closing Costs G.M. Millions
